Class Project

java.lang.Object
Project
public class Project extends Object
The Project class creates Project objects and displays their information to the user.

This class contains attributes of a Project object, a constructor to create new objects, an addProject method used to take input from the user about new Projects, a toString method to display the project's information and a displayPersonOnProject method to display the people associated with the project.

    This is the Project class constructor, it contains attributes relevant to each Project object.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projName, int projNumber, String deadline, String buildType, int erf, double totalFee, double paidSoFar, boolean finalised, Person architect, Person contractor, Person customer)
      This is the Project class constructor, it contains attributes relevant to each Project object.

      It also contains a conditional statement to set projName if one is not provided by the user.
      Parameters:
      projName - the project's name
      projNumber - the project's number
      deadline - the project's deadline
      buildType - the kind of building
      erf - the property's erf number
      totalFee - the total cost of the project
      paidSoFar - the amount paid so far for the job
      finalised - whether a project is complete or not
      architect - the Architect for the project
      contractor - the Contractor for the project
      customer - the customer for the project
